pkgmetadata.longdescription: # MDBParserEasy use Python library to read Microsoft Access (.mdb, .accdb) database files, this library use the mdb-tools command.## InstallingUse pip: `pip install mdb-parser`Or install manually:```git clone https://github.com/fedestella263/mdb_parsercd mdb_parserpython3 setup.py install```## Usage Example```from mdb_parser import MDBParser, MDBTabledb = MDBParser(file_path="db.accdb")# Get and print the database tablesprint(db.tables)# Get a table from the DB.table = db.get_table("MY_TABLE_NAME")# Or you can use the MDBTable class.table = MDBTable(file_path="db.accdb", table="MY_TABLE_NAME")# Get and print the table columns.print(table.columns)# Iterate the table rows.for row in table: print(row)```
